message: This year is the 3rd year my family is participating in our local Walk Now for Autism Speaks. This year we're also going big, with corporate sponsors, doll sales, raffles, and auctions to help fundraise. Our biggest raffle so far is an iPad 2. If you think you'd like to donate, enter a raffle, or buy one of our custom dolls, just check out aidensawesomeness.org
